cast.overview: In postwar Japan, Godzilla brings new devastation to an already scorched landscape. With no military intervention or government help in sight, the survivors must join together in the face of despair and fight back against an unrelenting horror.
cast.title: Godzilla Minus One

details.biography:
Ippei Sasaki is an actor who hails from Shizuoka Prefecture.

Sasaki's journey in the world of acting began in 2015 when he made his mark in the Japanese TV drama Majisuka Gakuen 5. His talent and dedication led him to further success, as he took on roles in renowned productions like the 2016 TBS drama The Full-Time Wife Escapist and the 2017 films Before We Vanish and The Limit of Sleeping Beauty.

Continuing his momentum, Sasaki showcased his acting prowess in recent years, captivating audiences with his performances in notable works such as Cheat (2019) and The Night Beyond the Tricornered Window. Beyond his acting career, Sasaki's interests and skills are as diverse as his roles, including martial arts, boxing, choreography, and playing the shamisen.
details.name: Ippei Sasaki
